MWC.GUI.Tools

Class PlainDragTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Tools.PlainTool
      • MWC.GUI.Tools.PlainDragTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, PlainChart.ChartDragListener, Tool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoveableDragger, Pan, RangeBearing, ZoomIn

    public abstract class PlainDragTool
extends PlainTool
implements PlainChart.ChartDragListener
    abstract class for tools which 'watch' the canvas, normally trapping movements
